item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Saturday, October 26, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:

11. A Simple Explanation of Postgres' Timestamp with Time Zone (2 points | no comments)
12. Bookmark Keywords: a hidden firefox feature (44 points | 18 comments)

16. Viewing MacOS system libraries in Ghidra (17 points | 4 comments)

22. A Multi-Language-Oriented Macro System by Michael Ballantyne at the (fourteenth RacketCon) is now available (3 points | no comments)
23. What are you doing this weekend? (5 points | 16 comments)
24. Building & using simple utils in Rye console (6 points | no comments)
